name: pipe-plan-build-review
description: Full agentic pipeline: plan, build, review, fix. Each phase runs as a focused Claude agent with restricted tools and file visibility via .claudeignore.
postMessage:
Plan-Build-Review pipeline installed!

Quick start:
  chmod +x scripts/pbr pipeline/pbr.sh pipeline/lib/*.sh
  ./scripts/pbr "Add user authentication"

Dry run (preview prompts):
  ./scripts/pbr --dry-run "Test feature"

Customize:
  - Phase configs: pipeline/phases/*.json (model, tools, file visibility)
  - Prompt templates: pipeline/prompts/*.md
  - Context files: .claude/context/*.md (project conventions)

Requires: claude CLI, python3, git
